items.title: Major game changer: Rove Miles adds Lufthansa as a transfer partner — why it matters
items.description: Rove Miles has added Lufthansa Miles & More as a 1:1 transfer partner. Here’s what that unlocks, including booking Lufthansa first class.

items.title: Deal alert: Chase cardholders can save up to 50% on top luggage brands like Tumi
items.description: Eligible cardholders can save big on The Shops at Chase purchases right now for brands like Tumi and Calpak.

items.title: Flight cancellations begin as shutdown throws major wrench in air travel
items.description: Airlines have begun canceling flights for Friday and the weekend as FAA-ordered cuts began in the midst of the government shutdown.
